AlphaVPS Returns With More EPYC Love: 2GB VPS in Bulgaria or Germany for €3.99/month!

alphavps, amd epyc, bulgaria, epyc, germany, kvm, nuremberg, sofia, storage June 4, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Looking for speedy CPUs and generous RAM in Bulgaria or Germany?  Or wants some storage with a 3:1 bandwidth:disk ratio? AlphaVPS may just have the offer for you.

  • Their EPYC-based KVMs start at only €3.99/month
  • And their storage VMs (which include a healthy 2GB of RAM) start at €4/month.  1TB of storage comes with 3TB of bandwidth; 2TB with 6TB!

AlphaVPS gave us an offer back on April 12, 2021.  They are registered in in 2013 as DA International Group Ltd. In Bulgaria with VAT ID BG202826767. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit Cards, PayPal, BitCoin and Wire transfer.

Here’s a little about AlphaVPS in their own words:

“I am very happy to announce that our AlphaVPS brand has expanded its offerings of production-ready EPYC KVMs to Germany. These are now available and can be ordered, based on AMD EPYC 7002/7003 at 2.8Ghz+! We’ve received a ton of positive feedback from the customers who’ve signed up for our new range of services! We’ve additionally added more capacity on our storage VPS line at only 5EUR per TB.

“AlphaVPS is a leading IaaS provider in Europe, offering Premium Cloud VPS, Storage Servers, Dedicated Servers, Colocation and Connectivity. Operating since 2013 and based in Europe. Our offices are located in Sofia, Bulgaria within the Telepoint DataCenter. We are staffed around the clock and our team is fully in-house with zero outsourcing. We run our own enterprise Juniper network and own all of the hardware.”

If you have been a customer of AlphaVPS or you give them a try out now, please comment below.

Now read more to see the offers!

  • KVM Virtualization
  • €3.99/month
  • [ORDER]
